channel.title: The Best Scape PI
channel.description:
-----Introduction-----
I started this server from the source IntDubPk. I have changed alot and added new things. The Reason I Am Releasing is because im bored of coding Hope You Like The Server
-----Things I Have Changed/Added-----
I Have Changed ModIcons I Have Added New Rights With Added InGame Icons Have ReMade Barrows Cash Exchange, No Limit With Your Cash I Have Added Christmas Crakers, Fully Working Custom Home Added Custom Monster Have Added Custom Staff Zone Have Added Custom Whips Have Added Desert, Jungle and Ice Strykewyrms Have Added Donator Points And Chest Have Added Three MiniGames:- DragonPoint Minigame Monster KIll Minigame Reward Minigame Have Added Full Torva Have Added Full Primal Added Login Interface (Made By Me) Added Staff Login Messages Added Lottery Have Added Packyak For Super Donators Added Terror Bird For Donators Customized Vote Shop Interface (Made By Me) Added Vote Tickets Have Moved Skilling Area (Move To Fishing Guild) Have Added Reward Interface Have Added Player Owned Shops have Fixed Alching (Could Only Alch In One Spot) Have Fixed Many Other Things Edited Client All Round Added New Items (E.g Donator Cape/Super Donator Cape I Have Added New Commands I Have Added Pking Points, Slayer Points Donator points, Dragon Points, Barrows Points Have Edited Slayer Tasks
-----Pictures!-----
[img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/BarrowsShop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/Cashexchance.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/DesertStrykewyrms.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/Crackers.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1123.photobucket.com/albums/l556/rhys54321/CustomHome.jpg[/img]
-----Credits-----
IntDubPk Creator---90% Rhys132 ---10%
The Link Includes Client, Source, and Cache
https://rapidshare.com/files/3607212378/The_Best_Scape.rar
